text: phir jab aa gaya unake paas saty hamaare paas se, to kah diya ki kyon nahin diya gaya use vahee, jo moosa ko (chamatkaar) diya gaya? to kya unhonne kufr (inkaar) nahin kiya usaka, jo moosa diye gaye isase poorv? unhonne kahaah do[1] jaadoogar hain, dono ek-doosare ke sahaayak hain aur kahaah ham kisee ko nahin maanate
